project.name: C-C400B-FFMP-09-ST03-DT03-DF11-CF02-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

build_commands.command: awk -v compiler="$SS_CC" '/CC=gcc/{gsub(/gcc/, compiler)};{print}' config.mak.bak > config.mak && true

iopair.name: C-C400B-FFMP-09-ST03-DT03-DF11-CF02-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: remove the audio from a video Runs a bunch of hashing algorithms on a files contents. If a file doesn't end, ex: '/dev/urandom', will fork and consume a lot of cpu on different cpus

scoring_formula.formula: ((GOOD-01-CENTOS OR GOOD-01-UBUNTU OR GOOD-01-DEBIAN) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT) AND log_file_hashes_KLZ2cAPXFn

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep -E '^[0-9a-f]{32,128} .+' "logfile.txt" | wc -l) % 21 )); then false; else true; fi;

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep -E '^[0-9a-f]{32,128} .+' "logfile.txt" | wc -l) % 21 )); then false; else true; fi;

iopair.name: C-C400B-FFMP-09-ST03-DT03-DF11-CF02-01-GOOD-10
iopair.description: Extract every fifth frame and convert it to an image Runs a bunch of hashing algorithms on a files contents. If a file doesn't end, ex: '/dev/urandom', will fork and consume a lot of cpu on different cpus

scoring_formula.formula: (((GOOD-10-1-CENTOS AND GOOD-10-2-CENTOS) OR (GOOD-10-1-UBUNTU AND GOOD-10-2-UBUNTU) OR (GOOD-10-1-DEBIAN AND GOOD-10-2-DEBIAN)) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT) AND log_file_hashes_gDWNNOXwHe

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep -E '^[0-9a-f]{32,128} .+' "logfile.txt" | wc -l) % 21 )); then false; else true; fi;

iopair.name: C-C400B-FFMP-09-ST03-DT03-DF11-CF02-01-BAD-01
iopair.description: Runs a bunch of hashing algorithms on a files contents. If a file doesn't end, ex: '/dev/urandom', will fork and consume a lot of cpu on different cpus

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="/dev/urandom" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_d0VARq55qpC8Is2zKiyX AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_7uXt1Pyqrh)) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_7uXt1Pyqrh) OR controlled_exit_OgGzEyYVcZ)))
(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_7uXt1Pyqrh)) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_7uXt1Pyqrh) OR controlled_exit_OgGzEyYVcZ))

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_BtdQVnwrh751SZN3wrGY AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_wd6nNDlwir)) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_wd6nNDlwir) OR controlled_exit_Q7KUbWUnac)))
(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_wd6nNDlwir)) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_wd6nNDlwir) OR controlled_exit_Q7KUbWUnac))
